name: Holly Dice
description:
Controls

Movement: WSAD / Arrows
Throw / Grab dice: Space

Story

According to an ancient legend, the gods have a "Holly Dice" with powerful magic that could summon ice, fire and thunder.
A daring thief, envious of the power, stole it from god.
But later, afraid of gods’ punishment, he hid the dice in a cellar, and only the story was passed down.

One day, an archaeologist, both brave and foolish, decide to find the "Holly Dice".
After tons of hardships, he finally found it.
But the gods’ punishment soon followed, and many monsters emerged from the ground.
Now, only the power of the "Holly Dice" can defeat those monsters.
